thread.title: Perth driver 'tried to hit 25 vehicles' before fatal crash | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Perth driver 'tried to hit 25 vehicles' before fatal crash | Daily Mail Online

author: Daniel Peters
title: Perth driver 'tried to hit 25 vehicles' before fatal crash | Daily Mail Online
text: 'He was smiling': Witnesses describe manic driver who ploughed his car into oncoming traffic killing a mother, 61, instantly - after he had tried to collide with 25 other vehicles Man who filmed fatal head-on crash said driver tried swerving into 25 vehicles Witnesses claim the 45-year-old driver was smiling and wearing aviators Footage shows him driving erratically along the Bussell Highway in Capel, WA He was thrown from his green Landcruiser and is in hospital in critical condition Driver of the Rav4, 61-year-old mother Jenni Pratt, tragically died at the scene Her passenger, 54, was airlifted to hospital in critical condition but is now stable Published: 23:17 GMT, 19 February 2017 | Updated: 02:05 GMT, 20 February 2017 52 shares
